title: Mac reinstall problem
body:
I had another thread that didn't answer this question.So,i got the ''we have restored to an old version of league'' 1 month ago on PBE.2 weeks ago I got on  the normal Client as well.The patching will just freeze at 0 ETA so I reinstalled.After reinstalling (with the old .dmg file) it didn't open.It will just blink,then go away.So I went into Show package contents>LoL>RADS>Projects>Installer>League Client.It would open,make a patch of about 10 gb,but it would freeze at 4693.9 and 11 ETA.I deleted that .dmg file and I installed another one (on EUW) which did the same.I just upgraded to OS X 10.8.5 and I can't upgrade to High Siera because I forgot my password.Please help me,I am playing since season 4 and I have lots of friends on this game.

*if this has no solve,tell me some other free mac 10.8.5 games*

P.S:Thanks so much

Edit:It did the patch in the morning,but another one appeared with 0 mb 0 ETA

replies.body: Hey, I'm betting that your connection may be unstable so it's failing to grab files and update properly.  Before anything else, run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tighten up your network and clear a solid path for your installation.  You may also need to grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform a clean reinstall and get rid of the corrupted data before reinstalling.

I have the same issue and i can't even play the game, my internet is quick and it doesn't cut off or something after the most recent patch and after i updated the game kept quitting it like appears on the dock for 2 seconds and disappears so i had to reinstall the game and when i did i finish the first download part which is the 1700 MB and then i click on League of Legends file but it doesn't open so i have to Show package contents>LoL>RADS>Projects>Installer>League Client and then click it but then it gets stuck at 4599.1 MB i did reinstall the game more than 5 times but it just gets stuck at that same spot.

> [{quoted}](name=VlRGIN,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ljm194yy,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-12-23T15:35:18.354+0000)
>
> I have the same issue and i can't even play the game, my internet is quick and it doesn't cut off or something after the most recent patch and after i updated the game kept quitting it like appears on the dock for 2 seconds and disappears so i had to reinstall the game and when i did i finish the first download part which is the 1700 MB and then i click on League of Legends file but it doesn't open so i have to Show package contents>LoL>RADS>Projects>Installer>League Client and then click it but then it gets stuck at 4599.1 MB i did reinstall the game more than 5 times but it just gets stuck at that same spot.

Exactly the same thing.It isn't user kernel or something,not the OS X,not the lockfile.Hope they patch it soon

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ljm194yy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-21T19:49:02.445+0000)
>
> Hey, I'm betting that your connection may be unstable so it's failing to grab files and update properly.  Before anything else, run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tighten up your network and clear a solid path for your installation.  You may also need to grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform a clean reinstall and get rid of the corrupted data before reinstalling.

It's not.Other games work just fine.

> [{quoted}](name=VlRGIN,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ljm194yy,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-23T15:36:30.065+0000)
>
> Did you fix it yet?

Nope
So nobody answers huh? I guess rip mac users...
